title: Comparative Studies in Society and History

contents.note: JSTOR (full text also available for subscription or payment)

additional-note: This is a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. However, the journal was founded by an American organization, and listed US subscription prices from its very first issue.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
